quoteFirst: At 12.30 a.m., on August 1, 1909, Max and I crept down from our sleeping bunks and stealthily, lest we should disturb the still slumbering occupants of the hut, proceeded to light the fire for breakfast and prepare for our departure. At
quoteLast: we were outside the hut putting on the rope and otherwise ready to move off. The night was calm.
